mapper.select: select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by notice_id) as notice, n.* from notice n order by n.notice_id) n2 where n2.notice between #{start} and #{end}
select * from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by notice_id) as notice, n.* from notice n where n.tag = #{tag} order by n.notice_id) n2 where n2.notice between #{start} and #{end}
mapper.update: update notice set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, tag = #{tag} where notice_id = #{notice_id}
